channel.title: [508] Pur3zscape source (quest commands) (only members) [508]
channel.description:
Ok i have pur3scape source and in the quest things there are action commands. that you can client. i want to know how to make some members only? how can i do this? i have this: [code](p.Members == 1);[/code]
but i want it to work but it does this:[code]Compiling all files.... .
et\com\espeon
et\packethandler\ActionButtons.java:60: illegal start of expre ssion if (buttonId == 7) && (p.Members == 1) { ^ .
et\com\espeon
et\packethandler\ActionButtons.java:60: ';' expected if (buttonId == 7) && (p.Members == 1) { ^ 2 errors Press any key to continue . . . [/code][br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 06, 2009, 05:44:18 pm[/size][hr]WOW ? BOMP PL0X?

item.title: [508] Pur3zscape source (quest commands) (only members) [508]
item.dc:creator: @roflscape roflscape
item.description:
@roflscape wrote:

Ok i have pur3scape source and in the quest things there are action commands. that you can client. i want to know how to make some members only? how can i do this? i have this: (p.Members == 1);

but i want it to work but it does this:Compiling all files.... .\net\com\espeon\net\packethandler\ActionButtons.java:60: illegal start of expre ssion if (buttonId == 7) && (p.Members == 1) { ^ .\net\com\espeon\net\packethandler\ActionButtons.java:60: ';' expected if (buttonId == 7) && (p.Members == 1) { ^ 2 errors Press any key to continue . . . [br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 06, 2009, 05:44:18 pm[/size][hr]WOW ? BOMP PL0X?
